oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Existence of Value in Stochastic Differential Games of Mixed Type
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GHOSH, MK
RAO, KSM
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bilateral constraints
Stochastic differential game
Stopping time
Variational inequalities
Viscosity solution
VARIATIONAL-INEQUALITIES
EQUATIONS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this article, we address stochastic differential games of mixed type with both control and stopping times. Under standard assumptions, we show that the value of the game can be characterized as the unique viscosity solution of corresponding Hamilton-Jacobi-Isaacs (HJI) variational inequalities.
